scripts.clean: git clean -fdX -e '.env' -e '.env.*' -e '!.env' -e '!.env.*' && find . -type f \( -name 'pnpm-lock.yaml' -o -name 'package-lock.json' -o -name 'yarn.lock' -o -name 'bun.lockb' -o -name 'bun.lock' \) -exec rm -f {} + && bun install
scripts.abis: bun run dependencies && bun run --cwd kit/contracts compile:forge && bun run --cwd kit/contracts abi-output && mkdir -p kit/charts/atk/charts/portal/abis && cp kit/contracts/portal/*.json kit/charts/atk/charts/portal/abis/
scripts.helm:check-context: [ "$(kubectl config current-context)" = "orbstack" ] || (echo "Error: Not in orbstack context. Current context: $(kubectl config current-context)" && exit 1)
scripts.helm:full: bun run helm:check-context && bun run secrets && bun run abis && bunx turbo genesis && bunx turbo run helm:deps --force && helm upgrade --install atk kit/charts/atk -f kit/charts/atk/values-example.yaml -n atk --create-namespace
scripts.helm:install: bun run helm:check-context && bunx turbo run helm:deps && helm upgrade --install atk kit/charts/atk -f kit/charts/atk/values-example.yaml -n atk --create-namespace --timeout 15m
scripts.helm:delete: bun run helm:check-context && helm uninstall atk -n atk --wait && kubectl delete pvc --all -n atk && kubectl delete namespace atk
scripts.helm:reset: bun run helm:delete && bun run helm:install
